basics.name: Jun GAO
basics.label: Research Associate
basics.summary:
I am a Research Associate at the [University of Luxembourg](https://wwwen.uni.lu/) in group [TruX](https://wwwfr.uni.lu/snt/research/trux) jointly led by [Prof. Jacques Klein](https://jacquesklein2302.github.io/) and [Prof. Tegawendé F. BISSYANDE](https://bissyande.github.io/). My research topic is on the security of Android applications.

I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science in early 2021 from [University of Luxembourg](https://wwwen.uni.lu/). I have more than 7 years of professional experience in quite a few different technical sectors as well. These reflect my eagerness for various technologies and competency in efficient self-learning. I am open-minded and I'm a person of critical thinking and self-examination.

In my leisure time, I am a jogger and badminton player. I enjoy reading Sci-Fi novels, books on physics, mathematics, economics as well as history. I also do side projects on machine learning and microcontroller programming.

highlights: Reading research papers to follow up latest research status and state-of-the- art techniques and tools, in order to setup research goals and steps.
Scraping websites and developing statistic analysis tools to collect data for empirical studies or ML/DL model training.
Develop tools, selecting ML algorithms or tuning DL networks to achieve re- search goals.
Writing, revising, reviewing, publishing research papers, attending academic conference and presenting research results.

Project Management:
    Functionality requirements collection. Development strategic plan. Development process control.

Web Application Development:
    Development planning. Developed an online chatting system based on XMPP. Developed the dynamic testing system based on selenium Python. Implemented part of the website UI by using JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

Service Setup:
    VPN setup (openvpn). Access control (Linux iptable). Version control server setup (Git). Webserver setup (AWS). CDN setup (CloudFlare). Work ow management system setup.

work.company: Kunming University of Science and Technology (KUST), China
highlights:
Campus network design and maintenance:
  • IP address configuration.
  • routing strategy design and implementation.
  • QoS strategy design and implementation.
  • Load balance configuration.
  • Routers, switches, WLAN, configuration.

Services setup and maintenance:
  • DHCP, DNS, email, WWW, RAID

Network Security setup & monitor:
  • Firewall configuration
  • IPSec VPN
  • IDS/IPS (Snort etc.) configuration and monitor
  • RADIUS configuration
